* BrightBlade smiled as she saw the four bots in their own battle, still 
leaning against her tree with her arms crossed. It was obvious that this 
wasn't going to be over any time soon and she then leaned all her weight 
against the trunk, simply relaxing in the company of her own enemies.
She looked over at the small battle, amusement written on her face.
BrightBlade then turned her attention towards Perndabot, noticing his thanx 
and info about the captured Maximals.
She smiled at him, calmly and without any other meaning bahind it. But then 
the smile turned a bit on the evil side but one that was directed towards 
her next sentance...not towards the Alliance member.*

" Maximals are ALWAYS pathetic in battle. They may not seem so at times but 
soon their true weakness are shown. Never fails."

* BrightBlade then looked Perndabot over, noticing that he wasn't all that 
bad for an Allaince bot. Even a bit on the handsome side.
She smiled at him again, with no real meaning behind it other then to 
clerify her statement.*

" You know, you're a rather handsome bot...when you're not pointing a gun at 
another."

* But she then turned her head towards the battle again, simply not wanting 
to see if the Alliance male shoved his blaster down her throat for what she 
had just said.
It wasn't normal for a Predacon to be standing beside an Alliance member and 
simply not be battleing each other, the fact that a Predacon had just 
commented an Alliance member only making the situation more odd.
But BrightBlade didn't care, she just simply spoke her mind...in hope that 
Hell Beast didn't hear about this.
But then her mind switched to him, her commander with the power over her to 
simply crush her life in the palm of his hand...and she would let him!
Her faith lied in him, the only bot she had EVER let rule over her...and 
followed so blindly and with total trust.
It was just her, nothing more. But she trusted him, something in which she 
had never done before.
BrightBlade then sighed as she uncrossed her arms and ran her fingers 
through her fur which crested her head, then simply placing a hand against 
her hip watching the fight.*
